transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan haan bolo.
Executive: Ji good afternoon mam. Manisha Bajpayee speaking mam IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Sir kal aapne mail dala tha na mam. Aap se to evening me baat ho gayi thi meri.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: To fir aapne mail dobara dala tha IndiaMART pe.
Customer: Are wo to kuch mera baat hua tha na Sagar bhai se.
Executive: Sagar se aapki baat hui thi.
Customer: Shayad isliye maine aapke liye bola na ki aap aisa feedback upar de dijiye isliye maine karwa diya.
Executive: Nahi nahi kuch problem aa raha hai kya?
Customer: Main yahi puch rahi thi aapko kyuki mera to aap se baat ho gaya tha na. Maine aapko bataya tha ki IndiaMART ka aapka account mujhe assign ho gaya hai. Sagar ka number bhi maine hi diya tha aapko.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hai na? To ye aapne dobara se mail update kar diya hai na? Accha mujhe ek cheez bataiye aapke paas do GST hai hai?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Aur aapko jo abhi maximizer ka plan lena hai aapne ye bola hai na maximizer ka plan lena hai aapko?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: To wo kisse lena hai aapko?
Customer: Are wahi samajhna hai na didi. Didi wo Sagar bhai ko maine kal bola hai wo aaj aane wale hai baat karne me. Wo aate hai main unse samajh leti hu didi aur main aapko bolti hu kaise karna hai.
Executive: Accha thik hai. Accha ek aur cheez hai agar aap bologe to isi wale GST pe hum aapka dusra wala GST update kar denge thik hai?
Executive: Plus aapka jo bacha hua paisa hai kyuki abhi aapko teen mahine hue hai service chalate hue na. Baki jo paisa hai wo aapka adjust ho jayega IndiaMART pe.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Accha accha accha samajh gayi dusre dusre me adjust ho jayega.
Executive: Haan matlab uska jo bhi aap jo bhi plan loge thik hai uska 60000, 70000, lakh rupaye ka jo bhi cost rahega usme se aapka jo bacha hua paisa hai wo minus ho jayega.
Customer: Thik hai didi. Accha mujhe ek cheez bataiye aapko isi company pe chahiye ya fir wo jo dusra GST ki baat aap kar rahi ho us pe chahiye?
Customer: Haan haan yes didi wahi mujhe ek baar samajhna hai kyuki main ek baar decide kar leti hu partner se kya karna hai thik hai. Abhi jo Sagar bhai aayenge na main chalo unse baat karti hu kaise karna hai jo mere ko laga ki isme chalega to mere ko koi dikkat nahi hai aur nahi chalega to mere ko dusra lena padega dusre GST me.
Executive: Accha to wo ek baar aap certificate bhej do GST ka. Main cross check kar leti hu details agar isi me update kara payenge to wahi wala GST update kara denge kyuki isme to already plan chal raha hai na mam aapka.
Customer: Haan haan hota hai aisa?
Executive: Haan hota hai na tabhi to maine bola ki agar aapka dekho agar details jaise sir se aapki baat hui thi to sir ko aapne bataya tha ki wo aapke husband ke naam pe hai hai na?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Haan to wo relation hum dikha sakte hai na ki company same hi spouse me hi hai to wo update ho jata hai isiliye main bol rahi thi aap GST certificate de do ek baar hum cross check kar lete hai agar details match hongi to agar aap bologe to.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi hongi madam dono ka kyuki surname alag hai address alag hai sab kuch alag hai madam.
Executive: Accha to mam ek baar aap accha wo wo aap ye keh rahe ho usme surname aur wo sab alag hai. Okay company aapki hi hai right?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Accha thik hai. To aap ek baar bhej do main dekh leti hu agar ho payega to hum log kara denge aapka matlab usme hum aisa hai ki hamara to dekho koi na loss hai na benefit hai but agar aapko chahiye ki mujhe maine already paisa de rakha hai thik hai aapko chahiye ki usi isi wale company pe mera ye wala GST update ho jaye to hum log try to kar hi sakte hai.
Customer: Main ye soch rahi hu dekho ye mera koi baat nahi mujhe ek answer dijiye ye yahi rakhenge thik hai hum but mera kya rehta hai ye same engineering se hai barabar na okay but mera jo mera brand abhi jo launch hua hai wo Shivai engineering hai.
Customer: Haan thik hai.
Customer: Yes to main isme photos dal sakti hu na Shivai engineering ke koi bhi power press ke isme khate me.
Executive: Haan haan bilkul dal sakte ho mam brand aapka wo hai na to hum jitne bhi product aapke dalenge na jaise jo bhi machinery aapki dali hui hai thik hai ab aapne 100 jaise 100 ton seat type power press machine hai thik hai to hum Shivai 100 ton seat type power press machine aise karke brand promote kar sakte hai aapka company hota hai.
Customer: Ha mujhe jo photo aate hai na usme jo maine photo dale hue hai na madam barabar usme bhi logo Shivai ka hi hai Shivai engineering ka hi hai thik hai to mujhe bas yahi confusion tha ki mere photos usme Shivai engineering ke hai aur mera brand hai na Shivai se hi wo aage badhega kyuki main jo packages me karana chahti hu barabar maximizer koi bhi barabar trust seal hai thik hai to abhi isme main koi bhi package karaungi to mera Shivai brand hi aage badhega samajh rahe ho na.
Executive: Accha to fir mam aapko pata hai main aapko genuine batau aapka kya benefit hai aap isme already paisa de chuke ho thik hai aapko agar upgrade karana hai na to isi me karao thik hai aur isme hum log aapka dusra wala GST update kara dete hai usme aapka kya fayda hai aapka bacha hua paisa adjust ho jayega aapne already ek saal ka 27000 plus GST 28000 diya tha aapne 28000 plus GST aap de chuke ho hai na ab 28000 plus GST me teen mahine ka paisa hata ke baki aapka jo bhi aath nau mahine ka paisa bacha hai wo aapka adjust ho jayega aur aapki service upgrade bhi ho jayegi.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ye main aapko bolna chah rahi hu aur aapka catalog jo hai usme Shivai karke hum log sare product wagera add kar denge.
Customer: Haan haan haan to matlab isi package me dono add ho sakte hai na matlab.
Executive: Haan matlab aapka Shivai engineering jo hai wo update ho jayega.
Executive: Aur product aapke Shivai ke naam se hi chalenge.
Customer: Isiliye to maine bola tha kal mam aap ek baar apna GST certificate bhej do.
Customer: Meri baat suniye Manisha ji ab dekho abhi ye Shiv engineering ab maine package liya hai barabar already chal raha hai okay usme hi main aapko ek Shivai ka GST number dungi thik hai to aap isme hi mera ek add kar denge just barabar na package yahi chalega okay jo normal mera abhi chal raha hai wahi okay abhi main photo me Shivai ke dal sakti hu na isme jitne bhi product me.
Executive: Haan haan Shivai ke to aap dal sakte ho.
Customer: Haan mera already mera Shivai ke naam ke photo already isme dale hue hai thik hai na.
Executive: Haan haan dal sakte ho aap ek baar bhej do GST certificate main aapka agar ho payega to main hand to hand aapka update kara dungi mam.
Customer: Okay mam abhi aapko GST certificate main bhej deti hu pehle aap sun lijiye na ki mere ko chalana dekho mere ko na visualization bahar market me same isme na IndiaMART me mere ko same engineering se hi chalana hai thik hai but mera product Shivai ka dalna hai aap samajh rahe ho na kehna kya chahte hai.
Executive: Accha aap ye keh rahe ho aapka business.
Customer: Market me wo GST nahi dikhna chahiye abhi jo main de rahi hu na aapko jo GST number dusra mera thik hai us us GST number se mere ko package nahi lena package kis number se lena hai ye Shiv engineering se hi lena hai dusra hum jo bhi karayenge na.
Executive: Accha Shiv engineering hi aapko chahiye IndiaMART pe.
Customer: Haan purchase same usme se hi chahiye package yahi chahiye but mera brand promote hoga Shivai ka.
Executive: To mam abhi main aapko aapke liye best kya hai aapka already photos dala hua hai Shivai ka thik hai aur aapne aapke sirf product me naam change karne hai product me aapke sirf simple simple dale hue hai 100 ton this machine 100 ton that machine.
Customer: Usme koi naam change nahi karna hai usme main to wo to main sab kuch kar lungi wo aapko kuch nahi karna hai abhi jo maine photo dale hue hai na isme jo product ke maine jo photo dale hai mam to aage main aur bhi dalungi usme Shivai engineering ke naam se hi aayenge logo to koi dikkat nahi aayega na?
Executive: Nahi usme koi dikkat nahi hai aur aapko company name IndiaMART pe GST number dikhe wo aapka Shiv engineering wala dikhe yahi concern hai aapka hai na?
Customer: Yes yes good good yes mam.
Executive: Haan thik hai to ye hum log kar sakte hai ye to mujhe kal bhi batate na to main aapko clarity de deti ye kar sakte ho kyuki kya hota hai na usually aisa hota hai ki logo ka trade name alag hota hai aur brand name alag hota hai hai na jaise aap jaise koi bhi aap koi bhi chips wagera bhi kharite hoge to wo company ki manufacturing company alag hoti hai aur uska naam brand name alag hota hai hai na to ye bahut common cheez hai Shiv engineering se aapka business promote ho raha hai Shivai naam se aapka brand hai.
Customer: Main Shivai ha mere ko ab GST dena hi nahi padega aapko dusra thik hai ha abhi hai na mujhe bas package hi samajhna hai thik hai main package samajh leti hu call connect karwayenge isme thik hai to ek kam kariye to jo aaj Sagar bhai nahi aayenge to main aapke 6 baje aapke meeting kar leti hu thik hai package samajhne ke liye.
Executive: Haan package samajhne ke liye aap online aake jo aapko baith ke sikhaya jayega samjhaya jayega wahi aapko call pe samjhaya jayega video call pe aap pura dekh sakte ho hai na agar wo aa jate hai to bahut acchi baat hai kyuki meri subah baat hui thi to wo keh to rahe the ki aapke paas aayenge agar wo aa jate hai to acchi baat hai aur agar in case nahi aate to aap hamare sath connect kariye thik hai call kar lijiye Manisha ji yes done done done baad me abhi kya thi ki mere isme sabhi me 65 65 isme product dale hue hai kyuki score 65 mere ko 100 score karna hai main abhi kyu nahi kar rahi thi usme mere ko PDF dalna hai youtube channel dalna hai sab kuch dalna hai barabar main isliye nahi kar rahi thi kyuki mera kya rehta hai Shivai brand alag hai mera purchase Shiv engineering se barabar na isliye nahi kar rahi thi but ab to clear ho gaya hai ki bhai mera photo aayega Shivai ka barabar ha Shivai ka aayega koi dikkat nahi hai upgrade jo bhi karaungi package purchase karungi Shiv engineering se hi karungi thik hai Shiv engineering se 100 score wala main ha Shiv engineering se to 100 score wala ab main pura product se acche se dalungi PDF bhi catalog dalungi sab dalungi thik hai thik hai thik hai wo aap kar sakte ho mam aur in case agar aapko kuch bhi confusion hota hai na to kuch bhi puchna hota hai kuch choti se choti cheez aap directly mera number maine aapko de diya hai aap mujhe connect karo aapko anytime bhi aap connect karenge aapko definitely reverse mil jayega thik hai customer care pe ya kyuki Sagar na aapke on field wale person hai thik hai hum log unko request karenge na wo aa to jayenge but wo ek hi baar aa payenge baad me to aapko mujhse hi connect karna hai isse accha mere sath hi aap connect karoge na to jyada better rahega okay okay to abhi koi dikkat nahi hai na mera dekho Shiv engineering se purchase hoga package aur mera usme Shivai ka hi photo aayega thik hai na ha ji ha ji ha ji mam done done done done thik chaliye thik hai agar wo aa jate to thik hai otherwise aap evening me 6 baje mujhe connect karti hu chaliye ha accha ek aur cheez mam wo kal aapne dobara mail kiya na to wo dobara se hamare paas concern open ho gaya I think ab clarity mil gayi hai to abhi to main isse close kar sakti hu right hmm kar dijiye kar dijiye close thik hai thik hai okay mam thank you have a good day mam ya ya
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to use Shivai brand for product promotion.

- Wants to update GST details.

- Wants to understand maximizer plan.



Resolution:

- Explained how to promote Shivai brand.

- Agreed to cross-check GST details for update.

- Agreed to schedule a meeting to explain maximizer plan.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send GST certificate.

- Executive will cross-check GST details.

- Meeting scheduled at 6 PM to discuss maximizer plan.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- gst, brand promotion, maximizer plan, update
